articles.description: Judd Trump beat Mark Williams 10-8 to win his second Masters title at Alexandra Palace
articles.content:
Judd Trump beat Mark Williams 10-8 to win his second Masters title at Alexandra Palace.
Trump trailed 8-7 but won three frames in a row to clinch the first prize of £250,000, wrapping up victory wit… [+2918 chars]
